parameters.text:
here is my last weeks plan:

Implement an AI-based feature to automatically populate budget lines using analyze data stored in the database.
Fetch AI analyze data via API when the AI button is clicked in the Budgets tab.
Machine Learning Model for SOW Classifier based On Layout
---------------------------------
here are the target achived for last week:

Analyzed Maconomy budget transfer screens to understand required fields, constraints, and user actions.
Implement an AI-based feature to automatically populate budget lines using analyze data stored in the database.
Fetch AI analyze data via API when the AI button is clicked in the Budgets tab.
Match the selected job number (main job or related job) with the corresponding budget data from the AI analyze response.
Extract Fee Budget and Out-of-Pocket (OOP) Budget values from the AI data.
Convert the extracted AI budget values into structured budget line entries.
Automatically insert the generated budget lines into the Budget Entry Table.
Preserve existing budget workflow while allowing AI-generated budgets to be reviewed and edited before submission.
Display appropriate success or warning messages based on AI data availability.
Handle edge cases such as missing AI data, unmatched job numbers, or empty budget values.
Ensure a smooth user experience with loading indicators and error handling during AI budget generation.
------------------------------

here is current week plan:

Budget Transfer – Functional & UI Understanding
Goal: Understand and align frontend with Maconomy budget workflows.
Studied Maconomy Budget Transfer general flow:
Source job / target job selection
Budget line mapping
Validation rules and submission flow
Analyzed Maconomy budget transfer screens to understand required fields, constraints, and user actions.
Mapped frontend fields with backend API payload requirements for budget transfer.
Identified UI gaps and necessary frontend validations before submission.

attributes.name: carry forward result %
attributes.description:
Percentage of tasks from the previous week that were not completed and were carried forward to the current week, calculated based on task priority.
You are given two text blocks:
1. Previous week plan content
2. Current week plan content

Calculate carry_forward_result_percentage as follows:
- Identify content in the current week that is identical or semantically equivalent to content in the previous week
- Compute the percentage of repeated content relative to the total current week content
- Return a single numeric value between 0 and 100
- Do not include % symbol or any text

attributes.name: incomplete part in the last week
attributes.description: Brief textual description of tasks planned in the previous week that are repeated in the current week as a result of incomplete completion or unachieved targets.

attributes.name: content_repetition_percentage
attributes.description: Percentage of the current week’s plan content that is identical to the previous week’s plan, indicating plan repetition.

attributes.name: refined plan for current week.
attributes.description: Give refined plan with all English /grammatical correction. Convert into full professional tone. Need good point wise plan. Do not change the plan. just refine the English content.
